basics.name: Jasmine Chan
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in May 2028.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa (UHM), Honolulu, HI

highlights: Assist students in ICS 211 lab with Java programming assignments.
Provide constructive feedback and guide students in problem solving and debugging programs.
Provide computer assistance by troubleshooting software and printer issues.
Apply technical writing skills to develop clear and concise manuals and documentation to support training and onboarding.
Navigated pharmacy software to accurately input and process prescriptions while applying problem solving skills to resolve insurance rejections and troubleshoot coverage issues.

awards.title: Provost Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: Selective, higher-tier merit scholarship awarded to recognize academic excellence and community impact among incoming freshmen.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Received the highest scholarship award based on excellent high school academic performance and maintaining a GPA of 3.6 or higher.
